alert.note: Alert for Carroll (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 04 at 7:36PM CDT until November 04 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Carroll County in northwestern Arkansas... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 736 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles southwest of Grandview to near Rudd, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Berryville... Eureka Springs... Green Forest... Carrollton... Rudd... Osage... Urbanette... Rule... Grandview... Dryfork... Cabanal... Metalton... Connor... Coin... Pleasant Ridge... Delmar... Denver... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for northwestern Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
